pkgmetadata.longdescription: Feature Store Client====================Feature Store is used to manage and provide easy access for curated features. The goal is to abstract the underlying storage of the features and also provide a consistent and unified storage for the features meta-data. The features should be versioned so data scientist can be sure that the model trained on specific combination of features will always lead to the same results.Feature Store Client provides a simple, high-level API for integrating Python environments with H2O.ai's Feature Store.
